personalInfo.name: Sandeep K
personalInfo.title: UI/UX Designer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate UI/UX Designer with 15+ years of experience creating intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences. I specialize in transforming complex problems into simple, elegant solutions that delight users and drive business results.

education.degree: Bachelor of Design (B.Des) in Visual Communication
education.description: Comprehensive design education covering visual communication, user experience design, design thinking, and creative problem-solving methodologies.
achievements: Completed internship at leading design agency

experience.title: Sr. UI/UX Designer & Developer
experience.description: Leading UI/UX design and development initiatives for enterprise-level applications, focusing on user-centered design principles and modern development practices.
responsibilities: Lead design system implementation across multiple product lines
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centered solutions
Mentor junior designers and developers
Conduct user research and usability testing
achievements: Led design system implementation across 5+ product lines
Improved user engagement by 40% through UX optimization

faqSection.title: Quick Questions?
faqSection.subtitle: Here are answers to some common questions about working with me.

faqs.question: What's your typical response time?
faqs.answer: I typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours, often much sooner during business hours.

faqs.question: Do you work with international clients?
faqs.answer: Yes! I work with clients worldwide and am flexible with time zones for meetings and communication.

faqs.question: What information should I include?
faqs.answer: Please include your project goals, timeline, budget range, and any specific requirements you have.

faqs.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes, I offer a free 30-minute consultation to discuss your project and see if we're a good fit.
